text: Yad Jon. Nɨbi God binɨb ne pelpel apnan gɨpɨm, Esiya plopens man awl keke anep kugul ak mɨdebɨm okok, nɨbop mɨj ñu kɨl tɨkebin. God ne mɨñɨl mɨdeb, ned yek, kɨdek yenɨgab ak, nɨbop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gek mɨdtep gɨnɨmɨb. Kawnan ne tam pakɨl anep kugul lup ak, God bɨawl besɨg mɨdep jɨj sɨŋak mɨdeb ak, ne abe nɨbop yɨmug nɨŋɨd gɨtep gek mɨdtep gɨnɨmɨb.
